wikipedia_page.main: Archibald Hastie was a Scottish professional footballer who played for Partick Thistle, Huddersfield Town and Motherwell.He played for Bradford City between 1938 and 1945, scoring nine goals in 31 official appearances, in a career interrupted by the Second World War, during which he served in the Royal Navy; he later also coached the club.
